articles.title: UPDATE | Suspect held as police rescue over 50 young men from home in Joburg - News24
articles.description: Swift action by Johannesburg-based police officers has led to the rescue of more than 50 young men allegedly trafficked from East Africa.
articles.content:
• More than 50 young men allegedly smuggled illegally into the country have been rescued in Zakariyya Park.
